Package spacesurvival.model.gameobject.fireable

Class FireableObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • spacesurvival.model.gameobject.GameObject
      • spacesurvival.model.gameobject.movable.MovableObject
        • spacesurvival.model.gameobject.main.MainObject
          • spacesurvival.model.gameobject.fireable.FireableObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collideable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Boss, FireEnemy, SpaceShipSingleton
    public abstract class FireableObject
extends MainObject
    A main object which can fire with a weapon, having a firing logic.
